<section id="about-us" style="background-color: #F7F6F2; padding: 3.5rem 1.5rem;">
  <div style="max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto;">
    <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.75rem; margin-bottom: 2rem;">
      <div style="width: 4px; height: 28px; background: #1F5E3B; border-radius: 2px;"></div>
      <h2 style="font-family: 'Playfair Display', Georgia, serif; font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 700; color: #2B2B2B; margin: 0;">About Us</h2>
    </div>

    <details style="margin-bottom: 1rem; padding: 1.25rem 1.5rem; background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #D9D8D4; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; transition: border-color 200ms ease;">
      <summary style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-weight: 600; font-size: 1rem; color: #1F5E3B; line-height: 1.4;">What is Y.E.T. Compassion?</summary>
      <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; margin-top: 1rem; line-height: 1.7; color: #5A5955; font-size: 0.95rem;">
        Y.E.T. Compassion is a nonprofit ministry based in Nashville, Tennessee, dedicated to serving South Sudanese diaspora communities. We provide youth mentorship, spiritual formation, education support, family workshops, and community building programs to help young people and families thrive.
      </p>
    </details>

    <details style="margin-bottom: 1rem; padding: 1.25rem 1.5rem; background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #D9D8D4; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; transition: border-color 200ms ease;">
      <summary style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-weight: 600; font-size: 1rem; color: #1F5E3B; line-height: 1.4;">Who founded Y.E.T. Compassion?</summary>
      <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; margin-top: 1rem; line-height: 1.7; color: #5A5955; font-size: 0.95rem;">
        Y.E.T. Compassion was founded by Gai Bol Luom, who has deep roots in the South Sudanese community and a passion for empowering the next generation.
      </p>
    </details>

    <details style="margin-bottom: 1rem; padding: 1.25rem 1.5rem; background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #D9D8D4; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; transition: border-color 200ms ease;">
      <summary style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-weight: 600; font-size: 1rem; color: #1F5E3B; line-height: 1.4;">Where is Y.E.T. Compassion based?</summary>
      <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; margin-top: 1rem; line-height: 1.7; color: #5A5955; font-size: 0.95rem;">
        Y.E.T. Compassion is based in Nashville, Tennessee, where we serve our South Sudanese diaspora community.
      </p>
    </details>

    <details style="margin-bottom: 1rem; padding: 1.25rem 1.5rem; background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #D9D8D4; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; transition: border-color 200ms ease;">
      <summary style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-weight: 600; font-size: 1rem; color: #1F5E3B; line-height: 1.4;">Who does Y.E.T. Compassion serve?</summary>
      <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; margin-top: 1rem; line-height: 1.7; color: #5A5955; font-size: 0.95rem;">
        Y.E.T. Compassion primarily serves South Sudanese diaspora youth and families in Nashville, Tennessee. We focus on empowering young people ages 13–25 and their families with mentorship, education, spiritual growth, and community connection.
      </p>
    </details>

    <details style="margin-bottom: 0; padding: 1.25rem 1.5rem; background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #D9D8D4; border-radius: 8px; cursor: pointer; transition: border-color 200ms ease;">
      <summary style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; font-weight: 600; font-size: 1rem; color: #1F5E3B; line-height: 1.4;">Does Y.E.T. Compassion work in South Sudan?</summary>
      <p style="font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; margin-top: 1rem; line-height: 1.7; color: #5A5955; font-size: 0.95rem;">
        Currently, Y.E.T. Compassion's programs are based in Nashville, Tennessee, where we serve the local South Sudanese diaspora community. We may explore international partnerships in the future.
      </p>
    </details>
  </div>
</section>
